decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, while protecting the combo with counterspells like Force of Will and Daze. The goal is to cheat out high-impact creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Murktide Regent early in the game, overwhelming the opponent with powerful threats. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Atraxa, Grand Unifier provide card advantage and utility, while Brazen Borrower offers flexibility and interaction.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize artifacts to ramp up quickly and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By combining cards that provide mana acceleration like Lotus Petal and Mox Opal with powerful artifact creatures like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Patchwork Automaton, the deck aims to set up a fast and powerful board presence. Additionally, cards like Force of Will provide protection and disruption to control the game. The inclusion of Urza's Saga and other artifact lands helps to consistently generate value and maintain pressure on the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to establish control early and disrupt the opponent's game plan by playing disruptive creatures and utilizing powerful enchantments like Chalice of the Void. With a focus on mana acceleration and land disruption, as well as utilizing cards like Magus of the Moon to further disrupt the opponent's mana base, this deck aims to quickly establish a dominant board state and close out the game before the opponent can recover. The combination of aggression and disruption makes it a formidable opponent in the Legacy format.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, then using cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring them back onto the battlefield for a devastating combo. The deck includes disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo pieces, along with card draw and manipulation spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to find the combo pieces faster. The deck also includes some creatures like Orcish Bowmasters and Murktide Regent for additional threats and board presence.

This Legacy deck focuses on assembling the Cephalid Breakfast combo, using Cephalid Illusionist and Nomads en-Kor to fill the graveyard and win the game with Thassa's Oracle or Dread Return. The deck also includes control elements like Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares, as well as card draw with Ponder and Brainstorm. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides additional card advantage and Teferi, Time Raveler can disrupt opponents' strategies. Urza's Saga is utilized to find key combo pieces while maintaining tempo and efficiency.

Utilize cheat into play mechanics such as Show and Tell and Omniscience to quickly deploy powerful threats like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. Stock Up and LÃ³rien Revealed provide card advantage and combo pieces, while protection spells like Force of Will and Spell Pierce help defend your combo. Cunning Wish acts as a versatile toolbox card to find answers when needed. Veil of Summer helps protect against disruption. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats before they can respond effectively.

The deck aims to quickly and consistently combo off by milling the entire library with cards like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer, then using Dread Return to bring back a creature like Thassa's Oracle to win the game on the spot. The deck is fast and explosive, using cards like Lotus Petal and Simian Spirit Guide to generate mana quickly and enable its combo pieces. It also includes disruption in the form of Cabal Therapy and Thoughtseize to protect its combo and ensure victory.

The main focus of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence through low-cost aggressive creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Murktide Regent, while using disruptive spells like Daze and Force of Will to protect them. The deck also includes efficient removal like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat to control the board. The inclusion of card draw and selection spells like Brainstorm and Ponder ensures that the deck can consistently find its threats and answers. Wasteland is used to disrupt the opponent's mana base, while Mishra's Bauble provides additional card advantage.

The deck aims to quickly and consistently assemble a combination of cards that allows the player to win the game on the spot, without needing to attack or interact with the opponent's creatures. By using fast mana sources like Lotus Petal and Simian Spirit Guide, as well as efficient rituals like Dark Ritual and Cabal Ritual, the deck can power out its combo pieces such as Undercity Informer and Balustrade Spy to mill the entire deck and win with either Thassa's Oracle or Jack-o'-Lantern. The deck also includes ways to protect the combo with Pact of Negation and disruption with Cabal Therapy.

The deck focuses on utilizing the synergy between Mystic Forge, artifacts, and mana acceleration to assemble powerful card combinations and overwhelming board presence. By generating mana through various sources like Urza's Workshop and Ancient Tomb, the deck can play out its key cards such as Glaring Fleshraker and Karn, the Great Creator efficiently. Mystic Forge acts as a card advantage engine, allowing the player to dig deeper into the deck and find the necessary pieces to execute a devastating combo. With careful planning and precise plays, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its explosive plays and unstoppable threats.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back onto the battlefield for a game-winning explosive play. It includes disruption elements like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo pieces and ensure the combo goes off smoothly. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, while also having versatile cards like Brazen Borrower for additional flexibility in different situations. Overall, it's a high-risk, high-reward strategy that aims to win the game quickly.

The main concept of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to quickly disrupt the opponent's hand and board state with cards like Thoughtseize, Hymn to Tourach, and Fatal Push, while also maintaining a steady stream of threats with aggressive creatures like Nethergoyf and Orcish Bowmasters. The deck aims to play efficiently and control the pace of the game through early disruption and consistent creature pressure. Additionally, the deck utilizes powerful lands like Wasteland to further disrupt the opponent's mana base and maintain a strategic advantage throughout the game.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize artifacts for aggressive plays and disruption, while also having a strong focus on graveyard interaction. By using cards like Mishra's Bauble, Mox Opal, and Urza's Saga, the deck can quickly put pressure on the opponent. Additionally, cards like Tormod's Crypt and Emry, Lurker of the Loch provide graveyard hate and recursion options. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of artifact creatures and disruptive spells, creating a fast-paced and versatile gameplay experience.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly dump powerful creatures into the graveyard, then bring them back onto the battlefield using spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. By utilizing cards like Entomb and Brainstorm to set up the graveyard, the player can easily reanimate game-changing creatures such as Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. With a mix of disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will, along with efficient card draw and mana fixing, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its powerful reanimation combo strategy.

The main concept of this deck is to build up enough mana quickly using cards like Dark Ritual, Cabal Ritual, and Lion's Eye Diamond to cast a high storm count spell like Tendrils of Agony or Empty the Warrens to finish off the opponent in one big combo turn. The deck also utilizes cards like Infernal Tutor and Grim Tutor for additional consistency and answers in the form of Cabal Therapy and Thoughtseize. The deck is designed to be fast and efficient in order to win the game before the opponent has a chance to respond.

The deck focuses on utilizing the combo of Nadu, Winged Wisdom and Nomads en-Kor to create a loop of drawing cards and gaining life. The deck also includes cards like Green Sun's Zenith, Chord of Calling, and Once Upon a Time to search for key combo pieces. The mana acceleration provided by cards like Gaea's Cradle, Noble Hierarch, and Birds of Paradise allows the deck to quickly assemble its combo and overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Endurance and Sylvan Safekeeper provide protection and disruption against opposing strategies.
